text.emotional: The one where this old dude starts a farm and causes chaos with his big tractor. He’s like me. Well… almost. He’s successful. You know that show?
text.silence: {.} the one where this old dude starts a farm and causes chaos with his big tractor {....} he's like me {....} well {....} almost {...} he's {..} successful {....} you know that show {...}
